summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 2, J. J. McGilvra's 2nd Addition, and the alley in Block 2, Replat of J. J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition, being the alleys between 41st Avenue North, from East Lee Street to East Garfield Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 9704 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
